Inderjeet Singh Bhullar is a Senior Undergraduate majoring in Computer Science and Engineering at the Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar, one of India's top engineering institutions. He completed a successful internship at Atlassian, where he developed production-level code using Spring Boot Java for Opsgenie. His expertise spans both software engineering and data science, including proficiency in Python, Java, and C++. He has worked on innovative projects such as constructing a programming language named ‘Dino’ and exploring machine unlearning and Bayesian unlearning. Inderjeet is also a Teaching Assistant in Machine Learning, showcasing his dedication to sharing knowledge and mentoring others.
